publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-362 Eleanor Scott: Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004â€”That the Parliament notes that Tartan Day is now celebrated in France as well as in the United States of America and urges the First Minister to attend the Tartan Day celebrations in Paris on 4 April 2004, thereby cementing the Auld Alliance and our historic and ongoing friendship with Old Europe.

S2M-362 Eleanor Scott: Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004-That the Parliament notes that Tartan Day is now celebrated in France as well as in the United States of America and urges the First Minister to attend the Tartan Day celebrations in Paris on 4 April 2004, thereby cementing the Auld Alliance and our historic and ongoing friendship with Old Europe.
S2M-362 Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004 (lodged on 18 September 2003) Christine Grahame*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Rob Gibson*, Alex Neil*
S2M-362 Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004 (lodged on 18 September 2003) Chris Ballance*, Patrick Harvie*, Robin Harper*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S2M-362 Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004 (lodged on 18 September 2003) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-362 Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004 (lodged on 18 September 2003) Margo MacDonald*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-362 Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004 (lodged on 18 September 2003) Brian Adam*
S2M-362 Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004 (lodged on 18 September 2003) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-362 Tartan Day, Paris, 4 April 2004 (lodged on 18 September 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
